top_categories.workout_context: Spring Thaw's Michigan rolling gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
Spring Thaw's Michigan rolling, Local event forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 50 miles.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Spring Thaw. Train it until it feels boring.
At Spring Thaw, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Spring Thaw's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before April.
When someone attacks on Michigan rolling gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Spring Thaw, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
50 miles on Michigan rolling gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Varied gradients on Michigan rolling gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
2-minute all-out efforts on Michigan rolling gravel. Closing gaps, responding to attacks, sprinting for position. Train the burn.
Smooth pedaling at 50 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Spring Thaw’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Spring Thaw requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on michigan rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: michigan rolling, local event, midwest gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and G Spot to prepare you for 50 miles of michigan rolling gravel in Muskegon, Michigan.
